statements: SELECT * FROM sustainable_farming;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM sustainable_farming WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name FROM sustainable_farming ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_farming WHERE farm_id = 100;
SELECT farm_id, certification_status FROM sustainable_farming WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location, certification_status FROM sustainable_farming WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_farming WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM sustainable_farming WHERE certification_status = FALSE ORDER BY farm_name DESC;
SELECT avg(farm_id) AS average_farm_id FROM sustainable_farming GROUP BY certification_status HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT farm_name, count(*) AS farm_count FROM sustainable_farming GROUP BY farm_name HAVING farm_count > 1 ORDER BY farm_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM farming_practices;
SELECT practice_name, practice_description FROM farming_practices WHERE certification_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, certification_body, expiration_date FROM certifications;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT practice_name FROM farming_practices ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT practice_name, practice_description FROM farming_practices WHERE certification_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, certification_body FROM certifications ORDER BY certification_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM farming_practices JOIN certifications ON farming_practices.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM farming_practices WHERE practice_name LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT * FROM farm_practices;
SELECT id, practice_name, description FROM farm_practices ORDER BY practice_name DESC;
SELECT certification_name, organization FROM certifications WHERE validity_period > 2;
SELECT establishment_name, location, certification_id FROM farm_establishments WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT p.practice_name, c.certification_name, e.establishment_name FROM farm_practices p JOIN farm_establishments e ON p.id = e.certification_id JOIN certifications c ON c.id = e.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM farm_practices WHERE certification_id = 1;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM farm_practices WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY practice_name DESC;
SELECT farm_practices.id, practice_name, certification_name, organization FROM farm_practices JOIN certifications ON farm_practices.certification_id = certifications.id;

SELECT farm_practices.practice_name, COUNT(*) AS total_establishments FROM farm_practices JOIN farm_establishments ON farm_practices.certification_id = farm_establishments.certification_id GROUP BY farm_practices.practice_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM farm_practices WHERE description LIKE '%sustainable%' OR description LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY practice_name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM Farmers WHERE certification_status = 'Certified';
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM Crops ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM Certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT farmer_name, restaurant_id, relationship_type FROM FarmToTable ORDER BY farmer_name ASC, restaurant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops WHERE harvest_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM Farmers WHERE certification_status = 'Certified';
SELECT * FROM Certifications ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT farmer_name, COUNT(relationship_id) AS num_relationships FROM Farmers JOIN FarmToTable ON Farmers.farmer_id = FarmToTable.farmer_id GROUP BY farmer_name HAVING num_relationships > 1;
SELECT * FROM farm_info;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location FROM farm_info WHERE certification IS NOT NULL;
SELECT farm_name, certification FROM farm_info ORDER BY farm_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_info WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' AND harvest_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT certification_name, certification_body FROM certification_info WHERE validity_period > 1 ORDER BY certification_name;
SELECT * FROM farm_info WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT farm_name, certification FROM farm_info WHERE certification IS NOT NULL;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM crop_info WHERE crop_type = 'fruits' ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, certification_name, validity_period FROM farm_info JOIN certification_info ON farm_info.certification = certification_info.certification_name;
SELECT transaction_id, restaurant_name, employee_name FROM farm_to_table JOIN employee_info ON farm_to_table.farm_id = employee_info.farm_id;
